HELLO: Hey I'm Steve, thanks for the add. Who're your friends? I don't like 'em.
HOW ARE YOU?: Eh, I'm doin' an overnighter for bitin' the mailman. He was tryin' to cast some spell on me like a wizard or somethin'. I don't know, maybe he was just wavin'.
WHAT DO YOU DO?: I like telling stories about people with problems. I can't really put it much simpler than that.
WHAT DO YOU UNDERSTAND?: Bits and pieces, ask me some stuff from some of my movies.
TELL ME ABOUT YOURSELF: I can't relate to 99% of humanity.
JOKE: My favorite review described me as the cinematic equivalent of junk mail. I don't know what that means, but it sounds like a dig.
DEFINE IRONY: A bunch of idiots dancing around on a plane to a song made famous by a band that died in a plane crash.
I LOVE YOU: Thanks, I feel the same way about French Fries and Oreos pizza
